general.answer: KaamMila is a hyperlocal micro-job marketplace in India that connects people for quick tasks such as deliveries, repairs, tutoring, cleaning, pet care, and more.

questions: Is KaamMila available only in Indore?
Can I use KaamMila outside Indore?
general.answer: KaamMila is focused on Indore but is expanding to other cities in India. Some services are already available nationwide.

questions: Do I need to pay to use KaamMila?
Are there charges for using KaamMila?
general.answer: KaamMila is free to browse and post jobs. Workers and clients can connect directly. Certain premium features may be introduced in the future.

questions: Where can I get help with KaamMila?
general.answer: You can reach KaamMila support through the Help & Support section in the app/website or by emailing support@kaammila.com.

questions: Are there parcel or grocery delivery jobs?
Delivery & Pickup.answer: KaamMila offers delivery tasks such as food delivery, parcel drop-offs, grocery shopping, and small package pickups within your local area.

questions: Can I hire someone for house cleaning?
Are there part-time cleaners on KaamMila?
House Cleaning.answer: House cleaning jobs include daily cleaning, deep cleaning, kitchen/bathroom cleaning, and part-time housekeeping.

questions: Can I find electricians or plumbers?
Repairs & Maintenance.answer: You can find electricians, plumbers, carpenters, and appliance repair experts for small and urgent household fixes.

questions: What kind of tutoring jobs are there?
Tutoring & Lessons.answer: Tutoring jobs include school subject coaching, online classes, and skill-based lessons like coding, music, or languages.

questions: Can I hire a pet sitter?
Pet Care.answer: Pet care jobs include dog walking, pet sitting, feeding, and basic grooming services.

questions: Are there part-time staff for weddings?
Does KaamMila provide decorators or servers?
Event Help.answer: Event help includes hiring servers, decorators, photographers, and general helpers for weddings, parties, and local functions.

questions: Can someone buy groceries for me?
Are there jobs for grocery delivery?
Grocery Shopping.answer: Yes, you can hire people to pick up groceries, medicines, and small items from local stores.

Gardening.answer: Gardening jobs include plant watering, lawn care, landscaping, and seasonal garden maintenance.

questions: What freelance jobs are on KaamMila?
Freelance.answer: Freelance jobs include graphic design, content writing, web development, and other short-term projects.

questions: Can I find evening or weekend jobs?
Part-time.answer: Part-time jobs include office help, shop assistants, event staff, and flexible roles suitable for students and part-timers.

questions: Are there quick gig jobs on KaamMila?
One-time.answer: One-time jobs include small, quick tasks such as delivery, furniture shifting, or a few hours of work that do not require long-term commitment.
